summary: A large-scale commercial rooftop installation powering an entire shopping complex with clean solar energy.
description: This ambitious project transformed the unused rooftop space of Metro Shopping Center into a 500 kW solar power plant. The installation features over 1,200 high-efficiency panels and is expected to offset approximately 80% of the mall's electricity consumption.
highlights: Annual savings of $180,000 in energy costs

testimonial.quote: Third Fuse Energy delivered an exceptional project that exceeded our expectations. The installation was completed on time and the energy savings have been remarkable.
testimonial.author: James Morrison
